articles.title: Zuckerberg’s 2012 email dubbed “smoking gun” at Meta monopoly trial - Ars Technica
articles.description: FTC’s “entire” monopoly case rests on decade-old emails, Meta argued.

articles.author: Carly Cassella
articles.title: CT Scans Projected to Result in 100,000 New Cancers in The US - ScienceAlert
articles.description: More Americans are receiving computed tomography (CT) scans than ever before, and while this technology can save lives, some scientists are concerned about the potential for low doses of ionizing radiation to increase cancer risks.
